settings.title: OUR STORY
settings.footer_text: Sozy is a small female-founded clothing brand based in Encinitas, California that supports women in every part of the business. Styles are designed by women, for women, with 10% of profit supporting survivors of sexual violence. Our products are USA made, carbon neutral, and 1 tree is planted with every order. We are partnered with 1% For The Planet and B Corp Certified. Feel good and look good with every purchase.

settings.text: Add some descriptive text to your all collections page.

settings.title: OUR MISSION IS TO EMPOWER WOMEN WITH SOFT + COZY CLOTHING
settings.paragraph: At Sozy we take a stand against sexual violence. That’s why we donate 10% of profit to support survivors.

settings.title:
GIVING BACK:
FEEL & SHOP THE DIFFERENCE
settings.paragraph: To support women in need. With every Sozy purchase we are collectively making a difference in the world, with 10% of profit supporting survivors of sexual violence and an additional 10% of profit supporting other charitable and environmental initiatives.

settings.title: SOZY AMBASSADOR PROGRAM
settings.paragraph: Not your typical ambassador program, this is about more than just promoting a brand. This program is about empowering women, setting a new standard, and making a difference. We are looking for passionate, unique, caring individuals who are tired of accepting the way things are and want to change our world for the better. Here at Sozy we want to set a new standard for how a brand should operate now and beyond.

settings.post_title: HOW TO MANIFEST A MORE POSITIVE MINDSET
HOW TO HELP YOUR SKIN AGE GRACEFULLY
4 RELAXATION RITUALS FOR STEPPING OF ANXIETY EDGE

settings.title_1: Cute Tops for Women | Stylish and Casual
settings.text_1: A women's top can completely change the look of an outfit, taking it from streetwear to party-ready in the change of just one shirt or blouse. Pair a long sleeve crop top with high waisted jeans for a stylish look ready for anything. Turn your mini skirt into a casual weekender outfit with a loose fitting tee shirt, or dress up a pair of leggings with a flowy blouse. The key is to build your wardrobe with versatile tops that can be worn with pants, skirts, jumpers, or leggings. From casual cotton tees to lace trimmed tank tops, the important thing is to find stylish clothing that feels good on your skin. And that's exactly what this collection brings you.
settings.title_2: Crop Tops and Long Sleeve Crop Tops
settings.text_2: Crop tops are a trend that we are happy to see come back around, making fashion fun and flirty once again. Sexy crop tops can dress up any bottoms, especially those with a high waist. A cropped pullover with long sleeves can dress up leggings when worn with booties, or thrown over a pair of shorts for a just-from-the-beach look. The secret to making a crop top tee look good is to pair it with a high waist, whether high waisted pants or a skirt. Whatever way you choose to style your cropped tops, find a way that feels good for you!
settings.title_3: How to Style Shirts and Tops For Any Occasion
settings.text_3: A classic tee shirt, flowy blouse, and cute crop tops are absolute essentials for a trendy Summer style. Pair them with long skirts and wide legged pants to take the look into the evening. We love the classic look of a white tee with a pair of jeans since you can dress the outfit up with heels or dress it down with sneakers. A graphic tee can look chic with a pair of skinny jeans or flirty with a pair of cute leggings. A cute tee goes a long way when paired with the right skirt, pants, skinny jeans, or dress. In cooler Autumn and Winter months, wear cute crop tops with high waisted jeans or under a jumpsuit to stay warm and stand out. Trade in your hoodies for one of our favorite cropped pullover looks with long sleeves. You won't regret it once you feel the super soft fabric against your skin! Whatever outfit you choose, know that we choose the softest fabric so that you can be comfortable no matter where you go, from brunch to dinner party, work to happy hour.

settings.title_1: Bottoms for Women | Midi Skirts, Maxi Skirts, Trendy and Casual Pants
settings.text_1: Women's bottoms never looked so stylish as with the midi skirt and palazzo pants. Up your fashion game with a mid length skirt made of fabric that hugs your waist, hips, and thighs in all the right places without being too tight or uncomfortable. Explore the length of the hemline a bit with a wrap skirt at midi length or a maxi skirt for a longer length. Pair with a casual cute crop top for a complete outfit that is perfect for both a day out with friends or a date night with your boo. We especially love the mid length skirt with sneaker look for a casual look that is ready for anything. Here, we've got all of the soft and cozy women's bottoms for the modern woman.
settings.title_2: How to Style Women's Midi Skirts
settings.text_2: Dress up a knee length skirt with a pair of strappy sandals, a statement necklace, and a white crop top. For those looking for athletic skirts for an active and versatile outfit, then pair our drawstring midi skirt with one of our classic tops and pair of tennis shoes for that cute skirt-and-sneaker look. For winter months, pair with a stylish ankle boot that lets you show off a fun colored pair of tights, or opt for knee-high boots that meet the hemline of your skirt to keep warm. The possibilities are endless... browse our new arrivals for more fashion inspo.
settings.text_3: Take a break from women's skirts and explore our fashion-forward wide leg pants and bottoms for a whole new foray into cozy fashion. Dress up a pair of palazzo pants with a cropped blouse for a chic spin on date night, or throw on a pair of sleek sandals for a casual and comfortable outfit ready for anything. Try a pair of bottoms with wide legs, a high waist, a cheeky slit, or a skinny legging style. Opt for fun patterns, like polka dots or floral print to make the style your own. Choose your favorite color or go for a neutral palette. Pair with boots or fresh sneakers, heels or flirty sandals. No matter how you wear them, find the look that makes you feel good. Gone are the days when the modern woman has to wear a mini skirt to feel sexy.
settings.title_4: How to Style a Maxi Skirt
settings.text_4: If you're looking for a longer length for a casual yet classy look, then grab a long maxi skirt in the softest of fabrics for what will soon be your favorite piece in your entire wardrobe. Going for something a bit sexier? Choose a wrap skirt with a long slit and pair with a cute crop top with a plunging neckline for an outfit that will make you stand out. Check our final sale items for a chance to snag something cute for cheap!

settings.title_1: Casual Dresses, Jumpsuits and Rompers for Women
settings.text_1: Casual day dresses that can easily be worn to work, out for drinks, or on a date, our one pieces made of soft and cozy material bring style to every type of woman in any type of situation. Here, discover uniquely designed everyday dresses, rompers, and jumpsuits that will help you feel comfortable and confident any time of the day. Whether it's a sexy black sleeveless dress, a light and airy jumpsuit with floral print, a midi dress with sneakers, or a sexy wrap dress in your favorite color, these styles are timeless and, above all else, comfy.
settings.title_2: Cute Dresses, Rompers and Jumpsuits for Any Season
settings.text_2: Looking for a casual summer dress that can go from fun day dress to sexy date night? Try a wrap dress with a plunging neckline in soft hip-hugging fabric that lets the faint summer breeze cool you down during the day and leaves something to be discovered at night. Or don a flowy maxi dress with hidden pockets and pair with bohemian sandals for a bold woman-of-the-world look. From an easy t shirt dress to a cozy sweater dress, our casual summer dresses make it easy to transition from a busy day on the town to evening plans, dinner parties, and outdoor celebrations. Heading off on a trip? Grab a romper or jumpsuit in your favorite prints for a bold look that is easy to wear. And for a more versatile look, our tank dresses pair just as well with a pair of sneakers as they do with sandals, heels, boots, or any other type of shoe. Explore our newest arrivals for fresh ideas.
settings.title_3: Women's Casual Dresses for Any Occasion
settings.text_3: Whether you're looking for a casual dress for an outdoor wedding or a mini dress for a night at the bar, your comfort does not have to be compromised by your style. Fill your entire wardrobe with casual dresses made of the softest (and sexiest) fabric you'll ever feel against your body. Stay casual and cozy by slipping a denim jacket over the shoulders, or dress up with a statement piece on the neck and flirty heels to match. Whether a classy midi dress, a bold maxi dress, a simple t shirt dress, a sexy wrap dress, or a flowy sleeveless dress, you can turn any of our casual day dresses into something of splendor with a bold statement necklace and the right pair of shoes.
settings.text_4: Love the versatility and comfort of dresses but miss the convenience of pants? Explore your own unique style in the latest trend with casual yet sexy jumpsuits and rompers. Find a dressy jumpsuit to wear out to evening gatherings, happy hour drinks, or a casual day at the office. Don a sleeveless romper or a floral jumpsuit for a fun and flirty outfit for the day. Wear over a sexy crop top for an added layer of style. Play with the length to find your unique style, either with a short romper with a ruffle trim or a long wide leg jumpsuit for an eye-catching look. For those looking for something to throw over their bikinis during the summer season, a light and airy cotton or linen fabric in our short romper will do the trick. Whether you want something form-fitting that hugs the waist or a wide leg casual jumpsuit, there are so many ways to wear our jumpsuits and rompers that will fit any occasion. Find the perfect women's romper or jumpsuit for you at Sozy.

settings.text_1: Looking for the perfect finishing touch to your outfit? From hair accessories to COVID accessories, you'll find the perfect accessory for your outfit. Whether you want to don a face mask or show off a cute pair of socks to peek outside your shoes, you'll find all of the latest styles here. Think earrings, sunglasses, rings, the perfect hat or beanie or glove, we bring in a collection of functional yet stylish women's accessories that you can wear with any outfit. Throw on a pair of jeans and wrap yourself in a soft and cozy women's scarf for a classy warm look in the winter. Or add stylish sunglasses and a fun scrunchie to your summer outfit for a pop of color. For those looking for some added style to their tee-shirt-and-jeans look, grab a cute bag and statement jewelry to go from casual to glam in a matter of minutes. Or wear a cute scrunchie with one of our popular crop tops for the girl-next-door look. All of our women's accessories pair perfectly with our soft and cozy collection of dresses, skirts, and rompers or a pair of soft and flowy pants for ultimate comfort and style. We've dreamt up a million ways to bring comfort to fashion and our collection of accessories adds the right details that make your look pop.
settings.text_2: But grab these accessories fast: we design our entire collection and each accessory is available for purchase only once. Once the item is sold out, it is gone forever. Check back regularly for the latest styles and sign up for our newsletter to get a discount and exclusive offers on your next purchase. That way, you won't miss the next perfect finishing touch to hit our shop.

settings.text_1: Find all of the best deals on your favorite clothes right here on our Final Sale page. From cozy pajamas to flowy pants to crop tops to midi skirts to that comfy-sweater-you-just-have-to-have, you'll find major deals on them all right here. Add that outfit to your cart quickly, though, because these sales are final. Once we sell out of your favorite dress or pants, they're gone from the website forever.
settings.text_2: Grab some fashion staples for your wardrobe before we run out! You can find all of your cozy casual bottoms (that can double as pajamas), jumpsuits, hoodies and cardigans, tops and skirts all on sale. Your favorite flowy dress that you've seen in our shop will also make it to our women's clearance page. We've even got that cute little accessory that you've had your eye on. Most of our tops pair well with any kind of denim bottoms, making our collection versatile and timeless and generally a good investment for your closet. (Especially when they come with a discount!)
settings.text_3: The best part about all of our clothes is that they can be dressed up or down, depending on the accessory and shoes. Pair one of our crop tops with a midi skirt and tennis shoes for a casual afternoon stroll. Swap the sneakers for some heels in the evening for a sexy date-night look. Wear our jumpsuits to work or while running errands during the day and wrap up with a jack or sweater in the evening. Pair one of our cardigans with some denim pants and flats for a respectable casual work outfit, then swap the jeans for some cozy bottoms for a night in. Literally every item in our shop can become a staple piece in your wardrobe.
settings.text_4: We only offer these looks once, so purchase yours before they're gone for good. From comfort to glam, you'll find the best deals right here.

settings.title_1: Freshly Cut Casual Dresses, Midi Skirts, Trendy Tops, And Flowy Pants
settings.text_1: If you're looking for the perfect outfit, then you'll find it right here. All of our latest styles in our clothing line appear here first. Our boutique owner and CEO designs every style, chooses every fabric, and snaps every photo that you see in our online shop. From that cute jumpsuit to the midi dress, you'll find all of the latest fashion trends right here.
settings.text_2: Pair our floral print midi skirts with an understated graphic tee and cute accessories for a distinct style. Swap it out with one of our trendy tops for the perfect outfit for a morning at the market. Pair a soft jumpsuit with a cozy sweater for the ultimate stay-at-home outfit or grab one of our crop tops and pair with your favorite denim jeans for a day running errands.
settings.text_3: Browse through our selection of trendy tops, casual dresses, flowy pants, cozy jumpsuits, and hip-hugging skirts. All of our tops are perfect for layering with a knit sweater, cardigan, or jacket and pair well with denim pants, skirts, or joggers. Our trendy dresses can be worn casually with a pair of flats or dressed up for a special occasion with a pair of heels.
settings.text_4: Our clothing line includes lots of neutral tones for a demur and classy look as well as floral prints for when you're feeling extra feminine. We take the latest trends and create styles that are more comfortable and casual so that you can feel good no matter what you're wearing. Not sure where to get started? Browse through our best sellers to see what shoppers are loving. Don’t forget to check out our final sale for a discount on your favorite styles. No matter what the perfect outfit looks like for you, you'll see it here first.

settings.title_1: Shop Our Best Selling Cozy Clothing
settings.text_1: Find your next favorite trendy piece in our wide selection of affordable pieces in women's fashion. From summer dresses to cozy pants, we always offer a great selection of our very own designer clothes at great prices. We're on a mission to flip fast fashion on its head by bringing designer clothing in house at an affordable price. We want you to shop the latest trends without doing any damage to the planet or to your wallet.
settings.text_2: Every month, our boutique owner and founder designs a new line of women's clothing that is soft, cozy, and sexy. When each new style or trend sells out, then we know to add it to our best sellers list where more people like you can find their new favorite trendy piece before we discontinue it forever. Pair our maxi dresses with some statement accessories and comfy shoes for the perfect daytime outfit. Slip into some of our flowy bottoms and pair with one of your favorite graphic tees for a casual afternoon. Throw on a cute dress with a pair of tennis shoes for a casual take on summer dresses. Here, you'll find all of our women's clothing in soft, understated colors so that you can wear them anywhere.
settings.text_3: Our color palette includes dark marsala, mustard, slate blue, dusty rose, rust, vintage olive, and your classic black or white. From tie-dye to floral patterns, our bottoms, cute tops, dresses and rompers come in a variety of free-flowing designs at an affordable price. These looks are back by popular demand and all available right here for your online shopping convenience!

settings.title_1: About Sozy | Soft and Cozy Clothing for Women
settings.paragraph_1: Sozy is a women's clothing brand that makes stylish comfortable clothing with soft fabric. After being frustrated with the fashion industry for prioritizing style over comfort, we decided to take matters into our own hands and bring softness into fashion so that we can look sexy and be comfortable at the same time. Each garment is designed and made in the USA using soft fabric that feels good against the skin. The brand offers a wide range of soft clothes (think: leggings, loungewear, dresses, sweaters, crop tops, skirts, jumpsuits, rompers, flowy pants, accessories, and more).
settings.paragraph_2: We opt for neutral colors and a loose fit so that each Sozy outfit that you wear is timeless and classy. Whether you want to wear a maxi dress, a tee shirt, joggers, a hoodie, or a pair of yoga pants, you can look sexy and feel cozy. There is no need to compromise softness for style, that is our promise.
settings.paragraph_3: More than just a women's clothing brand, we also support women in everything that we do. Each garment is designed by women for women and 10% of our profits go to RAINN to support survivors of sexual violence. All of our soft clothing is made in the USA to ensure fair treatment of the hard workers that help bring these soft clothes to our closets. All of our products are carbon neutral and every purchase that you make plants a tree with 1 Tree Planted. A portion of your purchase goes toward 1% For The Planet to help preserve the woman in all of our lives, Mother Earth.
settings.paragraph_4: So whether you choose to look sexy in a cotton tee shirt and jeans or in a curve-hugging knit dress, you are supporting women and the planet with every purchase.  Hundreds of others have joined our movement to make soft clothing a norm in the fashion industry and you can too. Apply to be an ambassador with our Sozy Babes community and work with us to change the way the fashion industry functions. If you just want the deals, then sign up for our newsletter and get a discount on all of our clothes, early access to new arrivals, and free express shipping on your first order. Shop through our Best Sellers to see what others are loving or snag a deal in our Final Sale items. Read through our blog for all of our latest lifestyle tips and stories on social and environmental issues. We are so happy to have you be a part of this journey

settings.section_copy: Want more Sozy? Sign up for our emails and get 15% off your first purchase!

settings.title_1: See what our customers have to say about our cozy clothing brand
settings.text_1: We believe that women's clothing doesn't have to be uncomfortable or that comfortable clothing means that you need to resign to sweat pants and slippers, either. So we created a brand that designs your favorite comfy clothes that can be worn to a casual day at the office, brunch with your friends, date night, or to bed as pajamas. Pair sneakers with a midi dress for a day on the town or a maxi dress with a jacket for a night out. From pockets to elastic waist bands, we've designed all of our tops, dresses and pants to fit your body with comfort (without sacrificing style).
settings.text_2: Opt for a drawstring waist and soft fabric this year and reimagine your favorite comfy clothes. So many women are already doing it. From jumpsuit to romper, dress to jogger, we make comfortable clothes look cute without sacrificing comfort one bit (think: leggings, loungewear, dresses, sweaters, crop tops, skirts, jumpsuits, rompers, flowy pants, accessories, and more). Maybe that's why everyone raves about us. Take a look at how our comfy clothes are revolutionizing women's fashion. We promise you'll love our stuff just as much as everyone else.

settings.page__description: Our customers love Sozy! Read over hundreds of reviews from happy customers who are loving our soft and cozy range of casual comfy clothes.

settings.author_bio: Jodie Oakes is a seasoned writer and content creator with continuously itchy feet. She can often be found traveling the globe with her campervan, dog, and surfboard in tow. Jodie is a travel, luxury, and wellness brand specialist with a degree in Imaginative Writing. She is a voracious reader who loves poetry, wine and cheese, and has a Lord of the Rings tattoo. Sorry. Not Sorry.

Jasmine is a professional tarot reader, numerologist, tarot reader, witch, spiritualist and science believer. She runs courses in numerology, astrology, tarot and witchcraft. She can be found petting random cats.
Avid DIY-er and plant mom, teaching you how to love your home one budget friendly project at a time!

settings.title: SIZING CHART
settings.main_description:
We are proud to offer a variety of amazing styles from different suppliers, but it also means that sizing varies from piece to piece. We put together this general sizing chart of what we consider each size to be in the hopes that it will assist you on your journey to finding your perfect Sozy piece. You should also read the descriptions of each product because we try on each style and let you know if we think it runs big/small and any other info that will inform your shopping decisions.

If you still need more information, don't worry! We can help you with that! Just shoot us an email or drop us a line... we will be happy to help in any way that we can!
settings.table:
Hed Dek goes here.

XS 00-0 30-32 23-24 32-33
S 2-4 32-34 25-27 34-37
M 6-8 34-36 28-30 37-39
L 8-10 36-38 31-33 39-41

2XL 12-16 41-42 37-39 45-47
3XL 18-20 43-46 40-42 48-50

For the best information on sizing for particular items, please refer to our product descriptions and model specs.
